comment: Write a polynomial matrix (over a commutative ring) as a sum of products of variable powers and constant matrices with scalar entries. (Contributed by AV, 27-Oct-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Dec-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 8-Dec-2019.)
